name: The Arkean Universe
description:
Game design document (GDD)
  • https://docs.google.com/document/d/11KzKSUn1i08h6xXCcK8wRsGq_154UnAariCG-trAa_k/...
Story
  • The 2 characters, Grim and Lunar, wake up in a mysterious inn where their only option is to explore the world and find where they really came from. They will go through many fights and enemies, will they find out who they truly are?
